name: Scare Your Boss: Virtual Fun
description:
Tired of working with horrible boss? It's right time to payback and beat the bad boss. Play amazing stress relief game, scare your office boss by playing mischievous pranks. Make mess in the office and irritate the angry boss to punish boss superiority. Teach bad boss a lesson, do whatever it takes to scare crazy boss. Destroy office laws, tease higher management and play boss game.
In the end the angry boss will yell upon you and here you will decide to make his life a living hell. Aim is to beat your boss and scare him and get rid off your stress. Make the crazy boss feel uncomfortable by making his tasks difficult for him. It’s your 1st day at office, find cabin and get files from desk and submit them to your boss office. Beat the evil boss, you will finally find out where he's from and why you need to take vengeance on him.

Features:
Interesting pranks play with angry boss
Addictive Gameplay to annoy the boss
Different Mysteries to solve!
High Quality 3D Graphics!
Amazing smash boss sounds!
Smooth and Easy Controls!

Download now and play this amazing beat your boss stress relieving game and give us your valuable reviews.
